Title: Switch to non-blocking
Introduction: In this test, you are provided with a working code: 2 MPI processes, one sends a message and the other receives it. The objective is simple: make this program use non-blocking operations instead of blocking ones.
Hints:
- MPI_Isend
- MPI_Irecv
- MPI_Wait
- MPI_Request
- MPI_Status
- MPI_STATUS_IGNORE
